Summary._: Northbound [C] trains are running express from Broadway Junction to Hoyt Schermerhorn because of a train with mechanical problems at Nostrand Av.

Description._:
Northbound [C] trains are running express from Broadway Junction to Hoyt Schermerhorn because of ice on the tracks at Nostrand Av.

Expect delays in [A] and [C] train service.

Our crews are on site to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

LongDescription:
Northbound [C] trains are running express from Broadway Junction to Hoyt Schermerhorn because of ice on the tracks at Nostrand Av.
Expect delays in [A] and [C] train service. 
Our crews are on site to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: Southbound [E] and Broadway Junction [M] trains service changes and delays because of a train with mechanical problems at Court Sq.

Description._:
Southbound [E] trains are stopping along the [F] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to W 4 St-Washington Sq.

Broadway Junction bound [M] trains are stopping along the [F] line from 36 St (QNS) to 47-50 St-Rockefeller Ctr.

Expect delays on [E], [F] and [M] trains.

These service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at Court Sq.

Broadway Junction bound [M] trains are stopping along the [F] line from 36 St (QNS) to 47-50 St-Rockefeller Ctr.
Expect delays on [E], [F] and [M] trains.
These service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at Court Sq.

LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[F] Jamaica-bound trains skip 75 Av, Briarwood, Sutphin Blvd, Parsons Blvd and 169 St</b>Days, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Fri, Jan 8 - 12<br><br>For service <i>to</i> these stations, take the [F] to Union Tpke or 179 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> 75 Av, Briarwood, Sutphin Blvd and Parsons Blvd, take the [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av<br>and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].<br><br>For service <i>from </i>169 St, take a <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/queens/q001cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF><b>Q1</b></font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/queens/q002cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF><b>Q2</b></font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/queens/q003cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF><b>Q3</b></font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/queens/q017cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF><b>Q17</b></font></a> or <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/queens/q036cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF><b>Q36</b></font></a> bus instead.<br><b><br>

Summary._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av

Description._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av

LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains run express from Broadway Junction to Marcy Av</b>D</font>ays, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Fri, Jan 8 - 12<br><br>Trains stop at Myrtle Av.<br><br></font>For service <i>to</i> Chauncey, Halsey Sts, Gates Av and Kosciuszko St</font>, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av<br>and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Flushing Av, Lorimer and Hewes Sts, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St*<br>and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].<br><br></font>For service<i> from</i> these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av or Broadway Junction and transfer to a <br>Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].<br><br><i>*Transfer at Marcy Av with <a href=http://web.mta.info/metrocard/mcgtreng.htm#unlimited target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Unlimited Ride MetroCard</font></a>.<br><br><b>Alternate travel note:<br></b></i>Take the <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/bkln/b046cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>B46</font></a> bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>
